name: Auto Location for WP Job Manager
author: Gravity Master

sections.description:
Auto Location Google For WP Job Manager allow to add location autocomplete by location search.

Demo | Demo2 | Pro Version | Support

Users when adding a location in WP Job Manager Auto Location auto-suggests locations. The locations are show up directly from Google Maps and Show popup on popup like that

This for visitor can be easy to auto suggest location from google in wp job manger

Features

  • One Click installation
  • Google attractive style show
  • All theme Supported
  • Get Correct Address from google
  • Easy To use

FEATURES OF THE PRO VERSION

  • Particular country of location show
  • Types Supported Ex. if choose cities than just show cities name

How To use Auto Location Google For WP Job Manager

Go to admin in Settings > WP Job Google Location just enable settings and add google api key. you can get api key from here Developers Google

Our More Plugins

Custom Field For WP Job Manager This plugin allows you to tailor job submission forms, capturing additional information specific to your needs.

Auto Location for WP Job Manager Enhance user experience by simplifying the job search process and enabling location-based filtering.

Setup Default Featured Image If no specific image is selected, the default will be displayed, ensuring a consistent look throughout your site.

Post to Pdf Convert your WordPress posts into PDF documents effortlessly with this plugin.

Festival Snow Effect Add a beautiful snow animation to your site, creating a festive atmosphere for holidays and special occasions.
